content:
Had to throw away work from Monday with the ‚Äúbig PRD and plan approach‚Äù

But taking small incremental steps is working :)
https://blossom.primal.net/e42026fbffc9298bd16c2abb63d2fee63e622b968ffeaa5b8cb57660eb655a2c.png. A customer context VM client talking to a customer context vm server - now we‚Äôre getting somewhere!
https://blossom.primal.net/bdc29fd680457bfd73cd952f5fd9004ac8d5b3120b506492beaff9dd227058ef.png
https://blossom.primal.net/77d1b22fad2497ed64709ec469bbdafe4b69b9043e0fa96be9f06f69b427cd8e.jpg. Alright let‚Äôs integrate it into the demo app
https://blossom.primal.net/6635320ffd4211f8e303e6c0d6c80442baa3d44d5dbc5fe570722618659d046f.png. Bollocks. That was supposed to be a ‚Äúcustom‚Äù context VM client and server :). Debugging the context VM client integration
https://blossom.primal.net/90fd36ab8639a21408ba1dc3f1f449e3e8a334ab420944eee3f0aef6cdba0302.jpg.

Creating a new feature PRD in wingman for this weeks demo. 
https://blossom.primal.net/ee9dd3f186450c7758c949c538bf8b9fd25555206296286e43933dca7b326d17.mp4. Dictating updates to the PRD
https://blossom.primal.net/8488aea794151df9269859fad95d84d7b7090e29ba28bb29b70dddcc7af383c7.mp4. After review we turn the PRD into a structured set of work packages for a developer sub agent to implement 
https://blossom.primal.net/374715a1fedda2cc96b0d413fb2280921a66c3858356d6c1aa49a168a2e768a1.mp4. We can review all of the docs in obsidian before we implement anything 
https://blossom.primal.net/2a65a66b4eaa07fc70dae94b91d41f8051a9f76e4d2f227674fcfac3f873775a.mp4. Then we just tell it to implement with sub agent
https://blossom.primal.net/21acc4929a7a9a56f7b957e31988944c987f8ece508300938aa2bfc46101edd7.png. Not the simplest test for mobile - let‚Äôs have a look if we can simplify it


https://blossom.primal.net/1d64f833cc7504b7472084c2e7f3f65d978004dab4d0cb1cd17dfc70d267ccd6.png. Just realised he created the code in the obsidian vault not the source directory ü§£

One step forward‚Ä¶ two steps back
https://blossom.primal.net/44894ac56525b1a5025a4c7b3f5bfe3b80fe4b19deba51c40ee0f335815baed6.png. Quick update tot the recipe!
https://blossom.primal.net/8d0bf049b6a922ba430769bbf7283d23a8448955b61281cb98b91d71e17c0f21.png. Hmmmm 
https://blossom.primal.net/4231aa47a706e2a8b7e164cb9f6d08d78aed77108ec530e9e24e7bd81d876b50.mp4. I got stuck in nano on my phone because I didn‚Äôt have key bindings to get out ü§£. Daily vibe code

https://blossom.primal.net/cab2b66f3a29b598b145971cdcf79a67a7713e803d59fa1e4192914d31c14797.jpg. New recipe adjustment had landed
https://blossom.primal.net/6203cff559e2aa84d482a79c34f41b494049943ea2f3fa0d201bd1b707684312.png.

Ok we now have wingman working nicely with tmux to manage build scripts and deployment from the phone :)


https://blossom.primal.net/32e2d37d54267695e524d5ae325f7a1e8b733fd30dd90ad785a1e2c01fb5accb.png
https://blossom.primal.net/4fe7ff397f7604facfc6be07d99344dd6fc4f1091f8dae6310a311de56b4c3ba.png. Sometimes‚Ä¶ 
https://blossom.primal.net/4fe662172d24bb4cb597f3a824132765369793ee94032433ecb850b929575a21.png. nostr:nprofile1qqsdxpfv503a2ga3ajqxw843hws9z7302ghpj4mcmjpa6qagmp9pwrs8222jg - goose is like a dog with half a dick today. https://blossom.primal.net/41bf8e225d01ef22f2972597856cb7e2c9abb07de2db28b895f8a91e6e4b1c52.png. The fix!
https://blossom.primal.net/828c879d347fce611c98545298d83f3c528e8e2b0b09e977af771a0d8aa8d0be.png. Now we‚Äôre cooking :)
https://blossom.primal.net/b7027577c9a6a8a1c0b75255e60f367119496823ead59aec55c1f9c353724cfb.png.

Not quite right but we have our first thing running just from the phone. 

Deployments are shit needs some thought
https://blossom.primal.net/b5ca6b0032ae4936d1b42e857c5c1a337e98be199dc4a6c1e58e09fb3fac9c0e.png.

Sec-05 Wk3: Goal an entire demo developed and delivered only over a phone or a daylight tablet. 

Largely working outside. Agent led, full Yolo mode. 

This account will track work throughout the week. https://blossom.primal.net/ec67d570d3db0d41cca1fd81379f5777dd6fd6157f194e3a5927aada3fe31e21.mp4. https://blossom.primal.net/5d3f413255799e3bf9153021c901492eb60ebe1c35c0b482432c6ac383f1ce61.png. Vibes are high coding
https://blossom.primal.net/c0ea305da5e737f48e8303f63493c83c2221a4976c3ae5981858689e7a738061.jpg. Pea connecting to my server in the apartment that does all the work whilst I walk around :) (ideally). Not the worst office
https://blossom.primal.net/c288fc234068d99719fe0da1d587a5b55714f440a82ceb3a3c80807827d28df8.mp4. Working hard, or hardly working?
https://blossom.primal.net/ee63b3263217ee31be7864deca210e14f60a8a9597290932f068f3c657ddf2c1.jpg. Hopefully getting a first example built in applesauce. 

Let‚Äôs see if it can compile and get it running on my phone without needing to bust out the laptop. 
https://blossom.primal.net/7411630793da1ef91c18acdccbe35090b84b8aa3a56d0926c0ecf8979a78ab9b.mp4
https://blossom.primal.net/3f4b189d24a27c9e86bfa984d8da286e453d48324fb7e2002577ccc5d675204f.png. Done :). This might need a bit of work‚Ä¶
https://blossom.primal.net/3f4b189d24a27c9e86bfa984d8da286e453d48324fb7e2002577ccc5d675204f.png
https://blossom.primal.net/d8d9eecd57b4a38eea4dd00d3603e57927c101846bce411b872a551f74c0c01e.png. Back on track
https://blossom.primal.net/e6ad8a272d48405ef89a03d96f03dfdc30f276670b7f8c255190c3c15b6288b4.png
https://blossom.primal.net/fb61f2a95d03d13e3166609a99438ccc8bb7339cbe82d5ba5ed57f13bc58c58c.png.
